issue.title: Controlling Pan Tilt Gimbal using JointControlPlugin and JointStatePublisher

content.raw: I’m trying to help with this…I added a joint controller and joint state publisher to our sdf file.  I then launched our model \(using localModel:=true\).  I went to a terminal to see if the ignition topics existed, and I ran ‘ign topic -l’, but I don’t see any list of topics.  Is there a way to view ignition topics when running subt ign-gazebo?
content.html: I’m trying to help with this…I added a joint controller and joint state publisher to our sdf file. I then launched our model (using localModel:=true). I went to a terminal to see if the ignition topics existed, and I ran ‘ign topic -l’, but I don’t see any list of topics. Is there a way to view ignition topics when running subt ign-gazebo?
